description: Scans the given device mount paths and reports the one with the least free space

paramSchema.title: Devices
paramSchema.description: The set of device mountings to check for free space. On Linux you use the mount path (ex. /). On Windows you use the drive letter (ex. C)

paramSchema.title: pollInterval
paramSchema.description: The interval on which to poll the system for disk usage. [Default: 3000]

paramSchema.title: Source
paramSchema.name: source
paramSchema.description: The Source to display in the legend for the CPU Core data.  It will default to the hostname of the server
